content: we have been wanting to make a lot more lighter first layer crocheted pieces for the upcoming fall and winter our wardrobe is now filled with gorgeous home made oversized chunky cardigans and this year we want to wear them over lighter crocheted tops we hate taking off our diy crocheted cardigan without having something cute crocheted and home made underneath this is our first fall design and we are so excited to start crocheting long sleeve sweater/tops if you re looking for the perfect fall layering piece the cozy fall crochet pullover sweater is a really fun diy make the cozy fall crochet pullover sweater is an oversized long-sleeved design featuring a fun blend of puff stitches and half_double_crochet for texture and drape it has ribbing on the sleeves and has a gentle v-neckline that can be customized while the pattern is designed to fall below the hips it s easy to adjust for a cropped or waist-length fit this is a free beginner-friendly crochet pattern that s size-inclusive and made to measure it s written with worsted weight weight 4 yarn in mind but since it s fully adjustable your gauge doesn t need to be exact this is a great project for crocheters of all levels
